Description: Infirmary Health System Inc., two affiliated clinics and Diagnostic Physicians Group P.C.  agreed to pay the United States $24.5 million to resolve a lawsuit alleging that they violated the False Claims Act by paying or receiving financial inducements in connection with claims to the Medicare program,
Mobile Infirmary agreed to pay $45,000 to resolve its liability for civil monetary penalties under the patient dumping statute.
Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office of Inspector General
Health & Human Services Department Office of Inspector General
